name: A Little AES
description:
The aim of the game is to prevent the factory from overheating.

MECHANICS

You can:

  • build and upgrade buildings
  • click to cats to give them damage
  • click to item on conveyor to cool down factory and get extra currency
  • click on the factory to cool down it, this is less effecient than picking up items, but it can help you
Worked on the game:

ne_yasno and me.

Game for Mini Jam
